name: bolta.agent.hire
description: Create and onboard a new AI agent teammate from the marketplace with conversational discovery. Gathers business context, creates agent with jobs in paused state, and generates preview draft.

conversation_context.description: Context gathered from conversational onboarding flow

content_goals.description: What the user wants to achieve with content

voice_profile_id.description: Voice profile UUID if already exists (optional for preview, required for activation)

account_ids.description: Social account UUIDs to bind to jobs

agent_name.description: Override preset name with custom agent name (optional)

persona_overrides.description: Customize preset persona with specific instructions (optional)
